metadata.title: CVE-2022-43440 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Uncontrolled Search Path Element in Checkmk Agent in Tribe29 Checkmk before2.1.0p1, before 2.0.0p25 and before 1.6.0p29 on a Checkmk server allows thesite user to escalate privileges via a manipulated unixcat executable

criterions.comment: check-mk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
